placesVisited: Full day city tour of New and Old Delhi, Jama Masjid, cycle rickshaw ride in Old Delhi, Red Fort, Humayun’s Tomb, Qutub Minar, Agra Fort, sunrise Tah Mahal visit, Fatehpur Sikri, Ranthambore National Park, three jeep safaris, Jaipur, Amber Fort, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, Hawa Mahal, local markets, half day city tour of Udaipur, shared boat ride at Lake Pichola, all airport and hotel transfers
generalInfo:
This Tour is a wonderfully crafted northern Indian and Rajasthani experience!

The 15-day trip takes in the Golden Triangle highlights of Delhi, Agra and Jaipur, adding beautiful Udaipur, too, and including some time in Ranthambore National Park, enjoying jeep safaris with the chance to spot tigers.

You’ll be staying in quality, beautiful accommodation for 14 nights. Our hotels are often family run and are handpicked for their special ambience and beautiful locations. Each one offers gentle hospitality, stylish rooms and homely comforts.

You’ll have a driver and air conditioned car to transport you and English speaking guides will help bring each destination to life, so you leave Rajasthan with a deeper understanding of local history, culture, religions and traditions.

dayInfo.description: Delhi - Day 1: Upon arrival in Delhi airport, you will be met by our representative and will be provided assisted transfer to your hotel. Upon arrival check in to the Hotel. Spend the rest of the day at leisure. Overnight at the Hotel (Colonels Retreat). Day 2: After breakfast, enjoy the half day city tour of New Delhi: Humayun’s Tomb • Qutub Minar • Drive Past Kartavya path & Janpath. Later in afternoon enjoy a Food tour of Old Delhi. along with an authentic Cycle Rickshaw ride.

Agra - After breakfast, you will be driven to Agra (04 Hours approx.). On arrival check in at the hotel. Afternoon sightseeing tour of Agra visiting Agra fort & Mehtab Bagh to see Taj Mahal from other side of the river during sunset. Rest of the day is free at leisure. Overnight at the hotel (Coral Court)

Agra - Ranthambore - Day 4: Sunrise Taj Visit (closed on Friday). After Taj visit return back to the Hotel for breakfast. Later drive to Bharatpur to board your afternoon train to Ranthambore (approx. 02 Hrs), en-route visit Fatehpur Sikri. Upon arrival in Ranthambore you will be met and transferred to your hotel, check-in at the hotel (Ranthambhore Regency). Day 5: Early morning proceed for jungle safari (shared basis) in Ranthambore National Park. Return to the hotel for breakfast & lunch. Afternoon, proceed for another jungle safari (shared basis). Overnight at the hotel.

Jaipur - Day 6: Early morning proceed for jungle safari (shared basis) in Ranthambore National Park. Return to the hotel for breakfast. After breakfast, drive to Jaipur (approx. 04 Hrs), enroute visit 8th century stepwell Chand Baori at Abhaneri village. Upon arrival in Jaipur, check-in at the hotel. Spend the evening at leisure. Overnight at the hotel (Ikkaki Niwas). Day 7: Today morning after breakfast, full day city tour of Jaipur. Places to visit include: • Amber Fort • City Palace • Jantar Mantar • Hawa Mahal (From outside only). In the evening explore the colorful local markets of Jaipur. Day 8: After breakfast, day free at leisure. We have a wide range of activities which we can organise for you for this free day on your request with supplement cost, for example: Art & Antiquities Walk, Block Printing, Bagru, Bazaars, Craft & Cusines, Blue Pottery Excursion, cooking demonstrations along with meal with the local family, Kite flying for the kids and so on.

Jodhpur - After breakfast, drive from Jaipur to Jodhpur (330 Kms / 6 Hrs Approx.) Upon arrival, check in at the Hotel (Ratan Villas). Day 10: After breakfast, visit Mehrangarh Fort and Jaswant thada. Followed by walk to the Wald city Bazaar. Rest of the day is free at leisure.

Udaipur - Day 11: After breakfast, drive to Udaipur (approx. 6 Hrs). enroute visit Ranakpur and Khumbhalgarh fort. Upon arrival check in to the Hotel (Trident). Day 12: After breakfast, Half day city tour of Udaipur. Places to visit include: • The City Palace • Sahelion ki Badi • Shared Boat Ride at Lake Pichola, and leisure time. Day 13: Day to enjoy at Leisure

Delhi - Day 14: After breakfast, you will be provided assisted departure transfer to airport to connect the flight for Delhi. • AI 472 1525 Hrs / 1640 HRS In Delhi, you will be provided assisted arrival transfer from airport to Hotel. Upon arrival check in to the Hotel (Pride Aero City). Day 15: After breakfast, you will be provided assisted departure transfer to airport to connect the flight for onwards journey.
